column2: blood (more poetically said as kukva tektada, water of life)
still body of fresh water (gained the fresh qualifier after the introduction of a separate word for sea)
being (something that exists in the physical world)
sky (originally roof, but that has been supplanted by kuv)
god (contrast with Ratseb, the one god)
a plant whose leaves contain caffeine; grows south of Çald
person slightly lower in social status
